generated_body: The article likely discusses the heroic actions of an individual who intervened during a plane crash in Phoenix, where they helped pull the pilot to safety. Readers may expect to learn about the circumstances surrounding the crash, including any contributing factors and the response from emergency services. The piece may also highlight the significance of the rescuer's actions, possibly exploring their background and motivations. Additionally, it could provide insights into the aftermath of the incident and any statements from witnesses or authorities involved.
